resources.string:
Drag your finger around to move.

Tap to click

Press and hold to drag windows around.

Get the keyboard up using the menu button.

You need the server installed on your computer before you can use this app. Visit our website for more details.

 Once the server is installed, run the server. The default port will be 1987 (which is the default if you leave it empty on the app as well).

 To find your ip use ifconfig on *nix and ipconfig on Windows.

 Tap to click and use the keyboard for typing. Enjoy!

 Focus.
